item.title: Prepare your SSO app for the OIN
item.description: Prepare your SSO for the OIN Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: What specific changes and preparations need to happen to your OIN app before submission starts Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: See existing content field for more details. Links to original docs: OIN-specific content related to app prep from the following docs: Build a Single Sign-On (SSO) integration: https://developer.

item.title: Prepare you lifecycle management app for the OIN
item.description: Lifecycle management app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Even though the original doc say’s “Overview” it really is more like a Guide Hub Links to original docs: - Overview of lifecycle management in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-lifecycle-mgmt-overview/ Content type: Guide Hub This type of document serves as a central navigational starting point within a larger documentation system.

item.title: Prepare you API Service for the OIN
item.description: Prepare you API Service for the OIN Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Add content on how to use the API Service Integration form. Links to original docs: Tease out how to prepare your API Service for the OIN from the following doc: Build an API service integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-api-integration/main/ Why is this here?: - Internal workshop: When asked what prevents devs form being successful on the OIN, respondents answered: - the API Service Integration form is confusing
